PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-10032023-10-06JUS
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE ÉRIC HARDY, a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the district of Québec, to be a puisne Judge of the Court of Appeal of Quebec, with residence in the territory of Ville de Québec or in the immediate vicinity thereof.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of the HONOURABLE ÉRIC HARDY, a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the district of Québec, to be a puisne Judge of the Court of Appeal of Quebec, with residence in the territory of Ville de Québec or in the immediate vicinity thereof.
